Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the expiration of the provisions authorizing the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Extends the expiration of the provisions authorizing the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the expiration of the provisions authorizing the county of Cattaraugus to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use taxes
